```{r}
library(broom)
```

```{r}
prostate_data_augment <-prostate_data_augment |>
  filter(!is.na(age)) |>
  filter(!is.na(`Primary lesion size(cm^2)`))
```

```{r}
library(broom)  # devtools::install_github("tidymodels/broom")
pca_fit <- prostate_data_augment |>
  select(`Treatment regime`,`stage`,`age`, `Serum haemoglobin level`, `History of CVD`, `Primary lesion size(cm^2)`, `Systolic blood pressure`, `Diastolic blood pressure`)|>
  prcomp(scale = TRUE) 
```

```{r}
pca_fit |>
  augment(prostate_data_augment) %>% # add original dataset back in
  ggplot(aes(.fittedPC1, .fittedPC7, color = `Primary lesion size(cm^2)`)) + 
  geom_point(size = 1.5)
```

```{r}
# extracting the rotation matrix
pca_fit |>
  tidy(matrix = "rotation")

```

```{r}
arrow_style <- arrow(
  angle = 20, ends = "first", type = "closed", length = grid::unit(8, "pt")
)

# plot rotation matrix
pca_fit %>%
  tidy(matrix = "rotation") %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = "PC", names_prefix = "PC", values_from = "value") %>%
  ggplot(aes(PC1, PC2)) +
  geom_segment(xend = 0, yend = 0, arrow = arrow_style) +
  geom_text(
    aes(label = column),
    hjust = 1, nudge_x = -0.02, 
    color = "skyblue2"
  ) +
  xlim(-1.25, .5) + ylim(-.5, 1) +
  coord_fixed() 
```

```{r}
pca_fit %>%
  tidy(matrix = "eigenvalues")

pca_fit %>%
  tidy(matrix = "eigenvalues") %>%
  ggplot(aes(PC, percent)) +
  geom_col(fill = "#56B4E9", alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:9) +
  scale_y_continuous(
    labels = scales::percent_format(),
    expand = expansion(mult = c(0, 0.01))
  ) 
```
